name.description: The name of the item. This is used to identify the item in the registry. It should be unique for your registry.

type.description: The type of the item. This is used to determine the type and target path of the item when resolved for a project.

description.description: The description of the item. This is used to provide a brief overview of the item.

title.description: The human-readable title for your registry item. Keep it short and descriptive.

author.description: The author of the item. Recommended format: username <url>

dependencies.description: An array of NPM dependencies required by the registry item.

devDependencies.description: An array of NPM dev dependencies required by the registry item.

registryDependencies.description: An array of registry items that this item depends on. Use the name of the item to reference shadcn/ui components and urls to reference other registries.

files.description: The main payload of the registry item. This is an array of files that are part of the registry item. Each file is an object with a path, content, type, and target.

path.description: The path to the file relative to the registry root.

type.description: The type of the file. This is used to determine the type of the file when resolved for a project.

target.description: The target path of the file. This is the path to the file in the project.

tailwind.description: The tailwind configuration for the registry item. This is an object with a config property. Use cssVars for Tailwind v4 projects.

cssVars.description: The css variables for the registry item. This will be merged with the project's css variables.

theme.description: CSS variables for the @theme directive. For Tailwind v4 projects only. Use tailwind for older projects.

light.description: CSS variables for the light theme.

dark.description: CSS variables for the dark theme.

css.description: CSS definitions to be added to the project's CSS file. Supports at-rules, selectors, nested rules, utilities, layers, and more.

envVars.description: Environment variables required by the registry item. Key-value pairs that will be added to the project's .env file.

meta.description: Additional metadata for the registry item. This is an object with any key value pairs.

docs.description: The documentation for the registry item. This is a markdown string.

items.description: The categories of the registry item. This is an array of strings.

extends.description: The name of the registry item to extend. This is used to extend the base shadcn/ui style. Set to none to start fresh. This is available for registry:style items only.

style.description: The style configuration for the base. This is available for registry:base items only.

iconLibrary.description: The icon library to use for the base. This is available for registry:base items only.

baseColor.description: The base color configuration. This is available for registry:base items only.

theme.description: The theme configuration. This is available for registry:base items only.

font.description: Font metadata for registry:font items. Required for registry:font type.

provider.description: The font provider. Currently only 'google' is supported.

import.description: The import name for the font from next/font/google (e.g., 'Inter', 'JetBrains_Mono').

variable.description: The CSS variable name for the font (e.g., '--font-sans', '--font-mono').

weight.description: Array of font weights to include (e.g., ['400', '500', '600', '700']).

subsets.description: Array of font subsets to include (e.g., ['latin', 'latin-ext']).

oneOf.description: CSS property value or direct CSS string
Nested CSS properties, selectors, or at-rules. Empty objects are allowed for at-rules with no body.
